banner.title: Manage Your Real Estate Portfolio Online
banner.subtitle: Curated, Advised, Delivered
banner.subText: India’s exclusive platform for end-to-end real estate wealth management

Accordions.title: Landlords
Accordions.content: We work closely with the prestigious, respected & most affluent landlords assisting them in liquidating or generating rental yields from their assets. A Client is not a number but an Entity for us

Accordions.title: New Age Entrepreneurs
Accordions.content: Our platform leverages advanced technology and industry expertise to provide personalized real estate solutions. Clients can easily manage their portfolios, access market insights, and receive tailored advice through our user-friendly interface.

Accordions.title: WFamily Business Owners
Accordions.content: We offer a range of services including property curation, investment advisory, portfolio management, and transaction facilitation. Our goal is to help clients maximize their real estate investments with minimal effort.

Accordions.title: Business Houses/ Corporates
Accordions.content: We offer a range of services including property curation, investment advisory, portfolio management, and transaction facilitation. Our goal is to help clients maximize their real estate investments with minimal effort.

features.title: Invest

features.description: Curated opportunities with proven ROI. Build wealth with confidence.

testimonials.name: Sulajja Firodia Motwani
testimonials.feedback: I was referred to Valion while planning an investment in Mumbai. The team was highly professional, understood family office complexities, and gave well-reasoned portfolio suggestions. They advised and executed the transaction smoothly. Wishing them success in their venture.
testimonials.position: Joint Managing Director - Kinetic Motor Company Ltd.

testimonials.name: Pankaj Sachdeva
testimonials.feedback: My experience with the MyFollo team for managing our real estate portfolio has been excellent. They are professional, proactive, and knowledgeable, handling our assets holistically to meet long-term goals. I would certainly recommend them and support their vision ahead.

testimonials.name: Atul Gupta
testimonials.feedback: I’ve known Amit for over 3 years. He and his team managed the sale of our commercial building in Noida with complete involvement — from preparing the IM to structuring the transaction efficiently. Thanks to Amit and team for their dedicated efforts. Wishing them the best.
